item.title: I got some great news today! 🎉 I found o...
item.description: I got some great news today! 🎉 I found out I don’t have to report for jury duty tomorrow. I've been called every other year for the last three years, but this is the first time I've actually been let off. What a relief! 😌

item.title: The Federal Government shutdown even too...
item.description: The Federal Government shutdown even took donotcall.gov offline 😕. Pretty sure that site runs itself and was already paid for! Guess I’ll have to wait to add a number 📞. #GovernmentShutdown #FTC

item.title: I think I’ve finally squashed all the up...
item.description: I think I’ve finally squashed all the upgrade bugs on Trixie! 🐞 The display with RustDesk looks so much better, and it feels like it’s running faster too. 🚀 Time will tell! #RaspberryPiTrixie #SelfHosting #Trixie

item.title: Just upgraded my Pironman5 Pi 5 with 8GB...
item.description: Just upgraded my Pironman5 Pi 5 with 8GB RAM and a 1TB NVMe from Bookworm to Trixie! 🚀 The process was bumpy. Now I have a gray background and can't access desktop preferences. 😅 But hey, everything else is working, and I can use RustDesk reliably! 💻 #TechUpgrade #Pironman5

item.title: I’m over the high prices and lack of val...
item.description: I’m over the high prices and lack of value from Microsoft Game Pass. I’ve got the games that matter and will buy new ones like Outer Worlds 2 outright. After the Starfield letdown, I’ve wiped all Game Pass titles I don’t own. Time to move on! #Gaming #Microsoft #GamePass

item.title: Yesterday afternoon, had a headache like...
item.description: Yesterday afternoon, had a headache like I haven't had in a long time 😩. I ended up in bed at 7 PM and finally woke up this morning without it! I'm not sure what caused it. Felt like a tension headache 🤕. I'm just really glad it's gone now. I felt like doing nothing while I was dealing with it.
